name: Persana AI
long_description: Persana AI is an intelligent sales copilot powered by our own custom fine tuned models. We ingest all of a companyâ€™s internal CRM data, combine it with public web sources on each of their prospects, and give them insights on who to prioritize based on crucial intent signals so that they capture ripe opportunities . For instance, when a lead visits the company website or gets funding, Persana AI can notify the sales team and generate an email to send out right away.
one_liner: Alternative to Clay | Intelligent sales agent with 75+ data sources
